mapper.insert:
insert into GROUP_BUY_BOOKING
GROUP_BUY_ACTIVITY_ID,
USER_ID,
GROUP_BUY_PRICE,
STATUS,
CREATE_TIME,
reference,
number,
#{groupBuyActivityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{groupBuyPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
#{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: update GROUP_BUY_BOOKING set DELETED = 1 where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
,
,
from GROUP_BUY_BOOKING left join GROUP_BUY_ACTIVITY on GROUP_BUY_ACTIVITY.ID = GROUP_BUY_BOOKING.GROUP_BUY_ACTIVITY_ID left join USERS on USERS.ID = GROUP_BUY_BOOKING.USER_ID where GROUP_BUY_BOOKING.DELETED = 0 and GROUP_BUY_BOOKING.ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
